nodes.text: Malgan Market was a market located in the city of Iziz on the Inner Rim jungle planet Onderon. As a central hub in the city, merchants and traders sold goods in the Malgan Market. Shortly after a public demonstration by the Onderon rebels, Dono reported to their leader, Steela Gerrera, that she overheard that King Ramsis Dendup was going to be executed the following day.
